title: About Browncoat
description: Browncoat is an opinionated kit for development. It provides a gulp starter setup, an organized Scss structure, and a built in documentation and styleguide framework. Browncoat uses semver specifications.
The key words MUST, MUST NOT, REQUIRED, SHALL, SHALL NOT, SHOULD, SHOULD NOT, RECOMMENDED, MAY, and OPTIONAL in this document are to be interpreted as described in RFC 2119.

sections.title: Start Here
description: Download from github. Open to the base directory and run the commands below.

sections.title: Gulp Task Management
sections.description: `npm run gulp` and `npm run docs` start a watch task. Changes to SCSS, js, html, md, or json files will trigger recompilling. Changes will trigger browsersync to reload or stream changes. See `gulp` section for details.
